Package avdta.network.cost

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DNLGenCost
    This cost function is used during a one shot simulation/assignment, and calculates the generalized cost based on recent travel times.
    DNLTime
    This cost function is used during a one shot simulation/assignment, and calculates the travel cost based on recent travel times.
    FFTime
    This cost function always returns the free flow travel time, and is used to calculate free flow travel times for origin-destination pairs.
    GenCost
    This class defines a generalized cost, which is a weighted combination of the link travel time and the toll.
    TravelCost
    A TravelCost is an abstract way to calculate per link travel cost, used for finding shortest paths in Network.
    TTCost
    The TTCost class uses average travel times from the previous simulation as its estimate for the travel cost.
